definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Ramp, triangle, noise, and DC waveforms.
sentences.chinese: 匝道，三角形，噪聲和直流波形。

sentences.english: Off-ramp and diverging area are important segments of interchange systems.
sentences.chinese: 出口匝道及分流區是互通式立體交叉的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: This approach is quite effective to freeway ramp metering.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法是相當有效的高速公路匝道控制。

sentences.english: A bus overturned on the freeway, blocking the off-ramp.
sentences.chinese: 一輛公車在調整公路上翻覆，堵住了出口匝道。

sentences.english: The first step is to excavate for the pedestal and ramp .
sentences.chinese: 第一步就是要挖掘的基座及匝道。

sentences.english: In urban areas, many exit ramps have more than one lane.
sentences.chinese: 在城市區域，很多出口匝道不只一條車道。

sentences.english: This detour will allow her a slower speed consistent with her situation.
sentences.chinese: 這一匝道將讓她有一個與她情況相符的較慢車速。

definition: abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
